alert.note: Alert for Taiya Inlet and Klondike Highway (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 22 at 2:56PM AKST until January 23 at 12:00AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT AKST TONIGHT... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 4 inches. * WHERE...Above 2000 feet along the South Klondike Highway. * WHEN...Until midnight AKST tonight. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Freezing levels are now expected to remain lower than pass level, therefore, we now expect moderate to heavy snow for areas above 2000 feet. Snow will be very wet and will mix with rain at elevations from 1000 to 2000 feet.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
